title: league 14 day suspension until 10/2/2017 9:17 p.m. currently 9:32 p.m.
body: My ban was suppose to be up 16 minutes ago, yet i am still banned? I am Eastern time. What time zone is this ban referring too?

replies.body: Those times aren't down to an exact second. If your ban hasn't been lifted by Oct 3, hit us up and we can take a look.
I have been unbanned :] i've learned my lesson lol i'm just going to keep cool from now on. I appreciate your reply and willingness to help broporo<3

There we go! 

I love to serve mah bros and ladybros, but sometimes a little patience is all we need though ^_^!
